original_title: Recombining and restoring 'The Cariboo Trail' for preservation
overview: Cinicolor: (Much) more than just a two-component color process.  Short documentary looking at the extensive work that was required over a 13 month period to restore 'The Cariboo Trail' (1950) ahead of a Blu-Ray release.
title: Recombining and restoring 'The Cariboo Trail' for preservation
